meanings.sent1: I keep my pens and pencils in the inkstands on my desk.
meanings.sent2: The inkstands on the teacher's desk were filled with colorful ink.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the inkstands, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an inkstand of creativity, overflowing with ideas.
meanings.sent5: The antique inkstands gleamed in the sunlight, adding a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: To place or set an inkstand on a surface.
meanings.sent1: She inkstands the elegant pen holder on her desk every morning.
meanings.sent2: Please inkstands the inkstand carefully to avoid any spills.
meanings.sent3: He inkstands the inkstand with precision, ensuring it is perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent4: The artist inkstands the inkstand at the center of the canvas before starting to paint.
meanings.sent5: Inkstands the inkstand gently on the table to avoid any splatters.
